trailingComments.value:
*
     * @desc
     *  Configures Serenity/JS. Every call to this function
     *  replaces the previous configuration provided,
     *  so this function should called be exactly once
     *  in your test suite.
     *
     * @param {SerenityConfig} config
     * @return {void}
